mapper.insert: insert into t_order (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, ORDERADDR, TOTALPRICE, PAYTYPE, STATUS, STATUSTEXT, TOTALPRICEOFF, TOTALDISCOUNT, PAYSUBJECT, REMARK, TELEPHONE, ORDERSOURCE, ORDERNO, ORDERSUBJECT, CONTENT, PERIODCODE, ORDERNAME, PAYNAME, SENTOUTTIME, SENTOUTTYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statustext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalpriceoff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totaldiscount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paysubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordersource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordersubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{periodcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sentouttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sentouttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_order set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDERADDR = #{orderaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALPRICE = #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYTYPE = #{paytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUSTEXT = #{statustext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALPRICEOFF = #{totalpriceoff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALDISCOUNT = #{totaldiscount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYSUBJECT = #{paysubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERSOURCE = #{ordersource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERNO = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERSUBJECT = #{ordersubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERIODCODE = #{periodcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERNAME = #{ordername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYNAME = #{payname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SENTOUTTIME = #{sentouttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SENTOUTTYPE = #{sentouttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, ORDERADDR, TOTALPRICE, PAYTYPE, STATUS, STATUSTEXT, TOTALPRICEOFF, TOTALDISCOUNT, PAYSUBJECT, REMARK, TELEPHONE, ORDERSOURCE, ORDERNO, ORDERSUBJECT, CONTENT, PERIODCODE, ORDERNAME, PAYNAME, SENTOUTTIME, SENTOUTTYPE from t_order where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, ORDERADDR, TOTALPRICE, PAYTYPE, STATUS, STATUSTEXT, TOTALPRICEOFF, TOTALDISCOUNT, PAYSUBJECT, REMARK, TELEPHONE, ORDERSOURCE, ORDERNO, ORDERSUBJECT, CONTENT, PERIODCODE, ORDERNAME, PAYNAME, SENTOUTTIME, SENTOUTTYPE from t_order
